continuum-skin-desc:
Bo continuum inga ɛ 2:
*11 - Monobuke pa'alɛ n tari nimpaala la yɛla zo'e zo'e n wan basɛ ti la kan tɔna ti nɛŋatɔlega bɔna. 
* - Vɛketa la naam pa'asɛ la WMF [[mw:Desktop Improvements]] tuunɛ
prefs-continuum-enable-continuum-1-help: Yuunsi'a n kini na wa, tu wan tu wan tɛɛra Continuum la ti di dɛna bumpaalega. Continuum paalega la wam bɔ'ɔra fole ti fu bisera yelesi'a n boi Continuum kɛka la puan (pɔsera Sapɔlɔgɔ 19). Fu san bɔta ti tu zamesɛ teere la yele, kiŋɛ [[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
continuum-opt-out-tooltip: Tee fu  fu maalegɔ la lebe ankɛka la puan(continuum paalega)
continuum-language-button-aria-label:
Kiŋɛ atikilɛ n bo tɔgum ayima puan. Bɔna
{{PLURAL:$1|$1 language |$1 languages }}
continuum-no-language-button-aria-label: Atikeli kuna bɔna la yeletɔgum kuna puan. Dikɛ atikeli la pa'ase yeletɔgum buna puan.
continuum-search-loader: Ba boti la pakirɛ bisega puti'irɛ
continuum-anon-user-menu-pages: Pɛgera n bɔ'ɔra leregere duma la ti ŋmɛ yese ba
continuum-toc-collapsible-button-label: Toggle la n de yelezuoto la
continuum-prefs-limited-width: Basɛ ti gu'a bɔna yalegerɛ la puan
continuum-prefs-limited-width-help: Basɛ ti gu'a bɔna yalegerɛ la puan ti la suŋɛ kaalegɔ tole nɛŋa
empty-language-selector-body: Pɛgerɛ la yelezuto ka sugerɛ bɔna yeletɔgum sɛba puan
continuum-toc-unpinned-popup: Yelezuto la, ba dikɛ ba kalam mɛ.
continuum-page-tools-unpinned-popup: Lɔgerɔ zi'an la tee bɔna la kalam
continuum-main-menu-unpinned-popup: Loosego zi'an la tee bɔna la kalam
